snippet.title: Path of Mage (2017) trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
Available at:
https://gw1p.itch.io/path-of-mage

Description:
Grab your spell book and prepare to blast through dungeons of skeletons!
Path of Mage is a RPG game where you take control of a young sorceress, fighting her way through dungeons filled with skeletons and bosses! You start small from a simple Fireball and grow up to summoning Blizzards and Tornadoes.
Develop your abilities and defeat your enemies with your demolishing magic!

Music:
"Exciting Trailer" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Full credits and license come with the game
